metadata.subject: Invitation to be a featured guest on Poetry in America

relationships.description: Elisa New is the Powell M. Cabot Professor of American Literature at Harvard University
Elisa New is the creator and host of the Poetry in America television series
Collaboration on a course for medical professionals

analysis.purpose: To invite Ms. Williams to participate as a featured guest on the Poetry in America television series
analysis.significance: Shows the academic and media outreach efforts of Harvard University faculty and the prestigious nature of the Poetry in America series featuring high-profile guests

notable_quotes: I am writing now to invite you to be a featured guest on my public television series, Poetry in America

Poetry in America's first season's guests included Joe Biden, Cynthia Nixon, Shaquille O'Neal, Yo Yo Ma, Samantha Power, Herbie Hancock, John McCain, Bill Clinton, Nas, Angela Duckworth, Bono, Regina Spektor, Frank Gehry, Stuart Weitzman, E.O. Wilson
I would be very honored to work with you

blackmail_indicators.description: No indicators of blackmail or coercion present - this is a standard professional invitation

illegal_activity.description: No illegal activity mentioned or suggested in this document

details: Reference to public television series Poetry in America
Mention of series airing on public television stations, Amazon Prime, and airlines

public_knowledge.context: Poetry in America is a publicly broadcast television series featuring high-profile guests, making this invitation and the series itself part of public media

analysis.summary: Elisa New, a Harvard University professor, invites Ms. Williams to be a guest on her public television series Poetry in America to discuss a poem by Sharon Olds, highlighting the prestigious nature of the series which has featured numerous celebrities and public figures.
